item.title: Overview of Islam
item.description: In the name of God, the Lord of Mercy, the Giver of Mercy. Let me begin with the sincerest intention all for the sake of truth. Assalamu ‘Alaikum! (peace be upon you!) Holy Book Islam’s holy book is the Qur’an. It is believed by the Muslims as the literal word of God revealed to Prophet Muhammad ï·º through Angel Gabriel. Nature of God The nature of God in Islam is Absolute Monotheism, that is, Muslims believed in One God only, which they defined in the concept of Tawhid.
